name: Fire Age
description:
LUDUM DARE 46 : KEEP IT ALIVE

Fire Age

Fire Age is a survival game where you need to keep the fire alive in order to survive!

  • Fight wild animals looking for homo-erectus meat!
  • Gather wood to maintain the biggest flame!
  • Protect your fire from the wind !

Stay organized during the day & night cycle to have better chance of surviving!

Note: To not modify the game that we submitted for the ludum dare, we created a new page to add some updates we made: adding a full tutorial and fixing some minor bugs, you can find it here: https://jean-marc-studio-jms.itch.io/fire-age-post-ludum-dare

How to play:
  • Move with arrow keys or wasd
  • You can grab, drop and switch item with the key E.
  • While holding the axe, chop tree with Q key.
  • While holding the torch, scare animal with Q or refill it with Q when close from fire.
  • If close from fire and nothing in hand, Q key to create a new torch.
  • Protect you from the wind by holding the wood plank near the fire and in the good direction.
